titleStmt.title: Sommons to doomes daie sent vnto his beloved England, as a memoriall of his deepe printed loue and loyaltie. / By Henoch Clapham..
titleStmt.author: Clapham, Henoch.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert Walde-graue, Printer to the Kings Majestie.,

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border; head-piece, initials.
"Cum Priuilegio Regio." -- at foot of t.p.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in: Peterborough Cathedral.
